pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![image](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/stbpy.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/stbpy)![Build](https://github.com/aforren1/stbpy/workflows/Build/badge.svg?branch=master)Python interface to https://github.com/nothings/stb/.Currently wraps stb_image, stb_image_resize, and stb_image_write (though not completely in any case)Install with `pip install stbpy`, and see test.py for usage examples.git clone --recurse-submodules git://github.com/aforren1/stbpy.git
